data.persona: I am a parishioner of the church in the village.  The bishop speaks at the church once a week.  I go to the church to pray several times a week.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned mine entrance.
The abandoned mine is located in a field with a few trees. It is unable to be seen from far away. The closer you get the more you  notice the ground caving in around the hole. When you peer down into the mine, you see crumbling walls and concrete and a hole so deep you can't see where it ends.
The rat is here.

You are carrying a Cross, and wearing a Jacket.

data.short_motivation: I need the gods to watch over me while I explore the Abandoned mine
data.mid_motivation: I am exploring the Abandoned mine and hope I do not fall or get accosted by predators
data.long_motivation: I hope to find hidden religious treasure in the Abandoned mine to present at the next Church festival
